io.scanbot.sdk.generictext.ui

Class WordboxPreviewView

  • io.scanbot.sdk.generictext.ui.WordboxPreviewView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasePolygonView, UiZoomDelegate

    public class WordboxPreviewView
implements BasePolygonView, UiZoomDelegate

    Allows to highlight the words which were recognized by interface GenericTextRecognizer

    See Also:
    interface GenericTextRecognizer
